forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early will evolve into a more steady rain for the afternoon. High 14C. Winds SE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early will evolve into a more steady rain for the afternoon. High 58F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy at times with periods of rain. Low 11C. Winds S at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm. Higher wind gusts possible.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy at times with periods of rain. Low 53F. Winds S at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch. Higher wind gusts possible.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 58F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to considerable cloudiness and fog after midnight. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early, then becoming foggy and damp later at night. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 48F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early, becoming mostly sunny in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Foggy early, becoming mostly sunny in the afternoon. High 59F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast. Low 9C. Winds ESE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Low 49F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies with periods of rain later in the day. High 13C. Winds ESE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain in the afternoon. High 57F. Winds ESE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 9C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early. Decreasing clouds late. Low 49F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun early, then becoming cloudy later in the day. High 14C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun early, then becoming cloudy later in the day. High 59F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Low 9C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then cloudy overnight. Low 49F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 13C. Winds ESE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers in the afternoon. High 56F. Winds ESE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then cloudy overnight. Low 8C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then cloudy overnight. Low 48F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 14C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 58F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low 8C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 47F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will become overcast in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some sun in the morning with increasing clouds during the afternoon. High 58F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy in the evening then periods of showers after midnight. Low 9C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy in the evening then periods of showers after midnight. Low 48F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High 14C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 58F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 9C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming less numerous late. Low 49F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming less numerous later in the day. High 13C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies with a few showers later in the day. High 57F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 8C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 47F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
